task.title: feat(encryption): data vault access control + audit logging 33A
task.description:
Goal: deliver the missing Phase 2–6 capabilities of the Data Vault so sensitive data access is role/organization gated and fully auditable, aligning with the AU2024203136A1-LIVE requirements for encrypted data + audit logs.

Scope (est. 5k–8k LOC):
- Access control enforcement for vault decrypt/read operations (wallet auth + org/role gating).
- Immutable audit log for every decrypt/read (who/what/why/when), stored in ScopeAudit and exposed via API.
- gRPC/HTTP endpoints for Vault CRUD + audit search (provider daemon + portal API gateway).
- Integration points for VEID documents, support tickets, marketplace artifacts to use vault APIs.
- Migration helpers for existing plaintext artifacts (if any).
- Metrics + alerts for vault access anomalies.
- Docs + runbook updates.

Implementation outline:
1) Define AccessControl interface + policies in `pkg/data_vault` and implement role/org checks against `x/roles` and org membership (x/group). 
2) Implement AuditLogger with append-only storage + hash chaining; add export hooks.
3) Add provider daemon endpoints for vault CRUD/audit; enforce request signing.
4) Wire vault usage into VEID/support/market workflows (read-only audit). 
5) Add unit + integration tests for access control and audit logging.

Acceptance criteria:
- Unauthorized wallet/org access is blocked and returns explicit errors.
- Every decrypt/read produces an immutable audit record (hash chained).
- Vault APIs exposed with auth + rate limits; basic client examples in docs.
- Tests cover access matrix, audit logs, and API error paths.

Dependencies:
- Leverage 30B (HSM integration) and 32A (vault core) already completed.

Testing:
- `go test ./pkg/data_vault/...` + new API tests.
- Provider daemon API contract tests.
